titleStmt.title: An answer to a great nomber of blasphemous cauillations written by an Anabaptist, and aduersarie to Gods eternal predestination. And confuted by Iohn Knox, minister of Gods worde in Scotland. Wherein the author so discouereth the craft and falshode of that sect, that the godly knowing that error, may be confirmed in the trueth by the euident Worde of God
titleStmt.author: Knox, John, ca. 1514-1572.

notesStmt.note: The running title reads: Against the aduers. of Gods predest.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
